data.name: The Body VR
data.description:
NOTE: Audio NOT compatible with bluetooth headphones.

The Body VR is an educational virtual reality experience that takes the user inside the human body. Travel through the bloodstream and discover how blood cells work to spread oxygen throughout the body. Enter one of the billions of living cells inside our body and learn how the organelles work together to fight deadly viruses.

Entirely new museum environment!
Four languages now included! (English, Spanish, French, and Chinese)
Various graphics and UI improvements throughout the experience.

Biggest update to date!

New scenes:
Nucleus - Travel inside the Nucleus and learn about DNA, our genetic code.
Rough Endoplasmic Reticulum - Explore the site of protein synthesis and see how Mitochondria produce energy for the cell.
Virus Attach - Watch as the cell defends itself against an incoming wave of viruses.

Other changes:
- Various graphical enhancements
- New UI for skipping between levels
- Bug fixes

New Scene! Travel through the Cytoplasm and learn how a Kinesin protein navigates around the cell!

- Level Select
- Performance Improvements
- Motion Sickness Improvements
- Bug Fixes
